attributes.action: install solar power for free on low income houses and sell the unused excess power back to the grid commercially as income for the government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By funding and installing complete solar power arrays on low income houses for free the following would be achieved:
1.Capital installation and employment
2.Increased demand for manufacturing skills and employment
3.Reduced living costs for the hardest up on low incomes
4.Generate a commercially based income for the government based on selling the excess power back to the commercial power companies.
5.Environmentally friendly power solution
6.Cheaper than new power stations
7.Long term revenue stream for govt
8.reduced market cost of solar panels due to increased supply - encouraging private domestic investment due to better payback
9.win-win for all involved

Essentially by this method a long term investment return for the country would be achieved, for less end-to-end cost than building nuclear power stations without the environmental impact.
